column4: So, uh 4 install attemps and 2 CDs later... "Operating System not found"
make your own wallpaper :^)
hi
heheh
Anyone have any last ditch advice for me to salvage this installation operation?
Maybe try to get the Live CD working and poke around?
I've tried to install 4 times, with 2 different CDs and I always get "Operating System not found"
you dual booting?
have you check forums?
yes I searched the forums but I couldn't find anything conclusive
let me have a look, hold on.
I really appreciate it!  Thanks
not a problem.
still here?
yes
use pastebin to paste sudo gedit /boot/grub/menu.list
should I do that when I get the Live CD running?
do you have anything else on the hard drive?
No, I wiped the whole thing and now it's just the main partition and the swap
Get on the live, run qtparted and make sure you have the right partition setup.
Okay, I'll check it out, brb
